short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: copy page url and title to the clipboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension copies the URL and title of the currently open tab to the clipboard.

It is a very minimal Chrome extension and is safe to use as it is open-source.
For the source code, please refer to the following link:
https://github.com/kuronekomichael/chrome-ext-simple-url-copy
